methods.signature: public Component getTableCellRendererComponent(JTable, Object, boolean, boolean, int, int)
methods.comments:
Optional[/** * Method that returns the custom component for the * display of the data contained in the cell of a table. * * @param pTable JTable - the table. * @param pValue Object - the data. * @param pSelected boolean - *
    *
  • True if the selected cell.
    • *
  • False otherwise.
    • *
* @param pHasFocus boolean - *
    *
  • True if the cell has the focus.
    • *
  • False otherwise.
    • *
* @param pRow int - the line number. * @param pColumn int - the column number. * @return Component - the component that customizes render the cell. * @throws IllegalArgumentException - if the value of the cell cannot * be rendered by this renderer. */ ]
